Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフである事は…… そんなにつらい事なのか……
Entry.EnglishText: Is being a Half... really that awful...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちが思う以上に、様々な苦労や 困難があるんだろう……
Entry.EnglishText: They must experience all sorts of harships and difficulties that would be unimaginable to us.

Entry.JapaneseText: 単なるヒューマであり、ガジュマである 俺たちには、計り知れない苦しみがな……
Entry.EnglishText: That pain would be unfathomable to us, considering we're mere Huma and Gajuma.
